attributes.action: Legislation jointly holding Service Providers and Agents  liable for contract breach..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Peace All

I invite those, who have suffered injustice of misrepresentation or breach of contract by a mobile phone contract agent (on behalf of a service provider), both the agent and the service provider be jointly and severally liable to the consumer for such a breach.

The agent indemnify the service provider to that extent.

And for it to be easier to initiate against the agent freezing orders on the business assets, and where there's deliberate wrongdoing Directors Personal assets also be frozen to the extent thy can not sell property and land, and appropriate responsibility be issued to a government agency to investigate, in specially money laundering, by agents, for the purpose of spreading assets.

I invite all Service Providers to consider such a legislation and its effect, and report upon that publicly, and either reject or provide support for it.
